meanings.definition: Not removed or erased from a computer or digital device.
meanings.sent1: The undeleted file was still visible on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The undeleted photos were taking up a lot of storage space.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally sent the email with the undeleted attachment.
meanings.sent4: The undeleted data lingered in the system like a ghost.
meanings.sent5: The undeleted document remained stubbornly in the folder.

meanings.definition: Still existing or present, especially in a digital context.
meanings.sent1: The undeleted message notification kept popping up.
meanings.sent2: The undeleted chat history revealed interesting conversations.
meanings.sent3: He felt like an undeleted file in a world of deletions.
meanings.sent4: Her memories were like undeleted files in her mind, always accessible.
meanings.sent5: The undeleted website bookmark was a reminder of past interests.
